synopsis.text: Ichiro Okochi's original novel, 'Yurikago no Hoshi,' serves as the inspiration for the captivating opening theme of Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury, titled 'Shukufuku.' This mesmerizing song is performed by YOASOBI and has been adapted into two music videos, one in Japanese and the other in English, titled 'The Blessing.' The music video, directed by Nobutaka Yoda, boasts unique animation that complements the song's enchanting melody. The English version of the music video was released on November 8, 2022, following the Japanese version which debuted on October 2, 2022. Fans of the anime can discover the original novel on the official website, further immersing themselves in the captivating world of Mobile Suit Gundam: The Witch from Mercury.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
